graphql.query:
query campaigns{
    campaigns(input: {
        # id: 1
        # name: "test"
        # subject: "test"
        # event: 1
        # emailTemplate: 1 
        # channel: 1
        # customerGroup: 1
    }){
        data{
            id
            name
            subject 
            status
            channel{
                id
                code
                name
                description
                theme
                homePageContent
                footerContent
                hostname
                defaultLocaleId
                baseCurrencyId
                rootCategoryId
                homeSeo
                locales{
                    id
                    name
                    code
                    direction
                }
                defaultLocale
                currencies{
                    id
                    name
                    code
                    symbol
                }
                inventorySources{
                    id
                    code
                    name
                    description
                    contactName
                    contactEmail
                    contactNumber
                    contactFax
                    country
                    state
                    city
                    street
                    postcode
                    priority
                    latitude
                    longitude
                    status
                }
                baseCurrency
                rootCategory
                logoUrl
                faviconUrl            
            }
            customerGroup {
                id
                name
                code
                isUserDefined
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                success 
            }
            emailTemplate{
                id
                name
                content
                status
            }
            event{
                 id
                name
                description
                date
            }
        }
    }
}

query campaigns{
    campaign(id: 1){
        id
        name
        subject 
        status
        channel{
            id
            code
            name
            description
            theme
            homePageContent
            footerContent
            hostname
            defaultLocaleId
            baseCurrencyId
            rootCategoryId
            homeSeo
            locales{
                id
                name
                code
                direction
            }
            defaultLocale
            currencies{
                id
                name
                code
                symbol
            }
            inventorySources{
                id
                code
                name
                description
                contactName
                contactEmail
                contactNumber
                contactFax
                country
                state
                city
                street
                postcode
                priority
                latitude
                longitude
                status
            }
            baseCurrency
            rootCategory
            logoUrl
            faviconUrl            
        }
        customerGroup {
            id
            name
            code
            isUserDefined
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            success 
        }
        emailTemplate{
            id
            name
            content
            status
        }
        event{
                id
            name
            description
            date
        }
    }

}

mutation createCampaign{
    createCampaign(input: {
        name: "testasfdasf"
        subject: "testfasdfaf"
        eventId: 1
        emailTemplateId: 1 
        channelId: 1
        customerGroupId: 1
        status: true
    }){
        id
        name
        subject 
        status
        channel{
            id
            code
            name
            description
            theme
            homePageContent
            footerContent
            hostname
            defaultLocaleId
            baseCurrencyId
            rootCategoryId
            homeSeo
            locales{
                id
                name
                code
                direction
            }
            defaultLocale
            currencies{
                id
                name
                code
                symbol
            }
            inventorySources{
                id
                code
                name
                description
                contactName
                contactEmail
                contactNumber
                contactFax
                country
                state
                city
                street
                postcode
                priority
                latitude
                longitude
                status
            }
            baseCurrency
            rootCategory
            logoUrl
            faviconUrl            
        }
        customerGroup {
            id
            name
            code
            isUserDefined
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            success 
        }
        emailTemplate{
            id
            name
            content
            status
        }
        event{
                id
            name
            description
            date
        }
    }
    
}
